item.title: Boy Accidentally Orders 70,000 Lollipops on Amazon. Panic Ensues.
item.description: Holly LaFavers said she was eventually refunded $4,200 for her 8-year-old son’s order of Dum-Dums candy.

item.description: The Instacart CEO told Fortune the U.S. healthcare system is not well-suited to treat rare and complex diseases, which is a major opportunity for AI.
